text:
mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: Cannot set a deleted experiment 'cross-sell' as the active experiment. You can restore the experiment, or permanently delete the  experiment to create a new one.
There are many options to solve in this link: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/60088889/how-do-you-permanently-delete-an-experiment-in-mlflow
question: MlflowException: Unable to Set a Deleted Experiment
